item.title: Code Review with Semgrep Custom Rules
item.description: Use Semgrep for code review to detect issues and improve code quality.

item.title: Improving Your Code Review Process With Semgrep
item.description: A tool to automate code analysis and enforce security best practices. Helps developers write better code faster.

item.title: Joining the Webmentions Community: A Beginner's Guide
item.description: A protocol to notify webpages about links, likes, or comments. Enables better communication on the internet.
